Colophon

Set in Söhne with a particular focus on typography that feels good. Built with Next.js with JavaScript disabled; you don't need to read documents, and their is no interactivity. Deployed with Vercel. The source code of this is availible on GitHub.

It is forked from the original repository of Gavin Nelson that can also be found on GitHub.
